basic_information.scholarship_name: Nannie Blanc Trammell Memorial Scholarship Fund

description: This scholarship is funded by the Oklahoma City Chapter of the National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution to support a UCO student who meets the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Must complete qualifying application Must be an Oklahoma resident Undergraduate or graduate student Enrolled full-time Must have a GPA of 2.5 (undergraduate) or 3.0 (graduate) Must be of admirable character

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Level is Undergraduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate
